title: Jalapeño, Cilantro, Lime Rice
directions: Combine jalapeños, garlic, cilantro, and lime juice in a food processor or blender.
Sauté chopped onion in olive oil until completely cooked and translucent.
Rinse off brown rice until water is clear.
Add rice, broth, onions, and cilantro mix to rice maker.
Cook according to the directions of the brown rice setting.
